q: Eric Schmidt , 55, has no doubt Page is ready for the challenges ahead. "Larry has been with me in every major decision in the past decade," Eric Schmidt said in an interview Thursday. It's not like he has been sitting around doing nothing. Although management by committee worked well enough to turn Google into an enormous success, it eventually slowed Google's reaction to popular new ideas such as Facebook and Twitter. inaugural, National Review Online spoke with Mike Pence about the Gipper, asking what his legacy means to him and the GOP. " Ronald Reagan is the reason I'm a Republican," Mike Pence tells us. I was active in local Democratic politics when I was a teenager in Columbus, Indiana. Then I started to hear the voice of a B-movie actor, turned governor, turned candidate. He gave voice to the ideals and values that I was raised to believe in. Republicans, Mike Pence continues, should learn from how Ronald Reagan led. Inside TV blog, AP Simon Cowell said that he hasn't seen a full episode of "American Idol" since he left the program, reports EW.com's Inside TV blog. I've seen three minutes of a recap. From what I've seen and from what I've heard, it all seems to be going well. What I was more concerned about[ was] the ratings falling off a cliff, and that the whole genre might be over, Simon Cowell said, the story notes. responsibility in the company. Earlier all the major strategic decisions were taken by the three of them together. But that is set to change. In a self-authored blogpost Eric Schmidt details about the new roles, Larry will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead. Eric Schmidt describes co-founder Sergey Brin as an "innovator and entrepreneur to the core" and rightly so, his role in new and strategic projects would be much needed. Friday night, Detroit is looking for a complete game to extend that winning streak. "The best part about it is we struggled at times in the game but we got it done," Allen Iverson said. We're going into the next game with some confidence. We're on a back-to-back so it's important for us to go get our rest and get ready to play. It's going to be a good measuring stick for us.
